Patience Ozokwor, // (na-ege ntị) (A amụrụ ya n'ụbọchị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ1958) ọ bụ onye Naijiria na-eti egwu, onye na-emepụta ejiji, onye na'agụ egwú gospel, na onye na-eme ihe nkiri

O meriri ihe nrite Best Supporting Actress 2012 & 2013 na 10th Africa Movie Academy Awards. A maara ya maka ịrụ ọrụ nke nwanyị ọjọọ na ụfọdụ ihe nkiri ya. Patience Ozokwor so n'ime ndị Naijiria puku irí kachasị elu nke gọọmentị sọpụrụ iji mee emume njikọta nke mpaghara ugwu na ndịda n'afọ 2014.
